verses.verse: Thou also <S%H1121><s%>, son of man <S%H120><s%>, take <S%H3947><s%> thee a tile <S%H3843><s%>, and lay <S%H5414><s%> it before <S%H6440><s%> thee <S%H2710><s%>, and portray upon it a city <S%H5892><s%>, even Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>:

and lay <S%H5414><s%> siege <S%H4692><s%> against it <S%H1129><s%>, and build forts <S%H1785><s%> against it <S%H8210><s%>, and cast up a mound <S%H5550><s%> against it <S%H5414><s%>; set camps <S%H4264><s%> also against it <S%H7760><s%>, and plant battering rams <S%H3733><s%> against it round about <S%H5439><s%>.

And take <S%H3947><s%> thou unto thee an iron <S%H1270><s%> pan <S%H4227><s%>, and set <S%H5414><s%> it for a wall <S%H7023><s%> of iron <S%H1270><s%> between thee and the city <S%H5892><s%>: and set <S%H3559><s%> thy face <S%H6440><s%> toward it <S%H4692><s%>, and it shall be besieged, and thou shalt lay siege <S%H6696><s%> against it <S%H226><s%>. This shall be a sign to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

Moreover lie <S%H7901><s%> thou upon thy left <S%H8042><s%> side <S%H6654><s%>, and lay <S%H7760><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> upon it <S%H4557><s%>; according to the number of the days <S%H3117><s%> that thou shalt lie <S%H7901><s%> upon it <S%H5375><s%>, thou shalt bear their iniquity <S%H5771><s%>.

For I have appointed <S%H5414><s%> the years <S%H8141><s%> of their iniquity <S%H5771><s%> to be unto thee a number <S%H4557><s%> of days <S%H3117><s%>, even three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and ninety <S%H8673><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>: so shalt thou bear <S%H5375><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And again <S%H8145><s%>, when thou hast accomplished <S%H3615><s%> these <S%H428><s%>, thou shalt lie <S%H7901><s%> on thy right <S%H3233><s%> side <S%H6654><s%>, and shalt bear <S%H5375><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>: forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>, each day <S%H3117><s%> for a year <S%H8141><s%>, have I appointed it unto thee <S%H5414><s%>.

And thou shalt set <S%H3559><s%> thy face <S%H6440><s%> toward the siege <S%H4692><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, with thine arm <S%H2220><s%> uncovered <S%H2834><s%>; and thou shalt prophesy against it <S%H5012><s%>.

And <S%H5414><s%>, behold, I lay bands <S%H5688><s%> upon thee <S%H2015><s%>, and thou shalt not turn thee from one side <S%H6654><s%> to the other <S%H6654><s%>, till thou hast accomplished <S%H3615><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of thy siege <S%H4692><s%>.

Take <S%H3947><s%> thou also unto thee wheat <S%H2406><s%>, and barley <S%H8184><s%>, and beans <S%H6321><s%>, and lentils <S%H5742><s%>, and millet <S%H1764><s%>, and spelt <S%H3698><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> them in one <S%H259><s%> vessel <S%H3627><s%>, and make <S%H6213><s%> thee bread <S%H3899><s%> thereof <S%H4557><s%>; according to the number of the days <S%H3117><s%> that thou shalt lie <S%H7901><s%> upon thy side <S%H6654><s%>, even three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and ninety <S%H8673><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>, shalt thou eat thereof <S%H398><s%>.

And thy food <S%H3978><s%> which thou shalt eat <S%H398><s%> shall be by weight <S%H4946><s%>, twenty <S%H6242><s%> shekels <S%H8255><s%> a day <S%H3117><s%>: from time <S%H6256><s%> to time <S%H6256><s%> shalt thou eat it <S%H398><s%>.

And thou shalt drink <S%H8354><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> by measure <S%H4884><s%>, the sixth part <S%H8345><s%> of a hin <S%H1969><s%>: from time <S%H6256><s%> to time <S%H6256><s%> shalt thou drink <S%H8354><s%>.

And thou shalt eat <S%H398><s%> it as barley <S%H8184><s%> cakes <S%H5692><s%>, and thou shalt bake <S%H5746><s%> it in their sight <S%H5869><s%> with dung <S%H1561><s%> that cometh out <S%H6627><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Even thus shall the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> their bread <S%H3899><s%> unclean <S%H2931><s%>, among the nations <S%H1471><s%> whither I will drive them <S%H5080><s%>.

Then said <S%H559><s%> I <S%H162><s%>, Ah Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>! behold <S%H5315><s%>, my soul hath not been polluted <S%H2930><s%>; for from my youth <S%H5271><s%> up even till now have I not eaten <S%H398><s%> of that which dieth of itself <S%H5038><s%>, or is torn <S%H2966><s%> of beasts <S%H935><s%>; neither came there abominable <S%H6292><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> into my mouth <S%H6310><s%>.

Then he said <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H7200><s%>, See, I have given <S%H5414><s%> thee cow <S%H1241><s%>'s dung <S%H6832><s%> for man <S%H120><s%>'s dung <S%H1561><s%>, and thou shalt prepare <S%H6213><s%> thy bread thereon <S%H3899><s%>.

Moreover he said <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H1121><s%>, Son of man <S%H120><s%>, behold <S%H7665><s%>, I will break the staff <S%H4294><s%> of bread <S%H3899><s%> in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>: and they shall eat <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> by weight <S%H4948><s%>, and with fearfulness <S%H1674><s%>; and they shall drink <S%H8354><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> by measure <S%H4884><s%>, and in dismay <S%H8078><s%>:

that they may want <S%H2637><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> and water <S%H4325><s%>, and be dismayed <S%H8074><s%> one <S%H376><s%> with another <S%H251><s%>, and pine away <S%H4743><s%> in their iniquity <S%H5771><s%>.
